query_applied: ("Fibromyalgia"[Mesh] OR fibromyalgia[tiab] OR "Chronic Widespread Pain"[tiab] OR myalgia[tiab]) AND ("Microbiota"[Mesh] OR microbiome[tiab] OR "Gut Microbiome"[tiab] OR dysbiosis[tiab] OR "Bacterial Diversity"[tiab]) AND ("Diversity"[tiab] OR "Alpha diversity"[tiab] OR "Beta diversity"[tiab] OR richness[tiab] OR "16S rRNA"[tiab] OR "Metagenomics"[tiab]) NOT (Review[pt] OR Meta-Analysis[pt] OR Editorial[pt] OR Letter[pt] OR Case Reports[pt]) AND (Humans[Mesh])
